title: Warren Buffett
deleted: In December 2011, Buffett's [[MidAmerican Energy]] Holdings agreed to buy a $2 billion [[solar energy]] project under development in California and a 49 percent stake in a $1.8 billion plant in Arizona, his first investments in [[solar power]]. He already owned [[wind farm]]s<nowiki/>.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/print/2011-12-20/bp-to-shut-down-solar-power-unit-exit-business-spokesman-says.html |title=BP Deems Solar Unprofitable, Exiting Business After 40 Years |author=Marc Roca and Ehren Goossens  |date=December 20, 2011 |work=Bloomberg }}</ref>
